page.title: 02Education in Dalkeith
page.content:
There are ten educational establishments in Dalkeith. These include Scotlands only Adult Residential College which is Newbattle Abbey, two schools for mentally and physically handicapped - Lugton and Westfield, three primary schools - Woodburn, Kings Park and St Davids, two secondary schools - Dalkeith High and St Davids High, Esk Valley College of Further Education and the Scottish Examination Board (both St Davids schools are for Roman Catholic, the others are non- denominational).
All of the schools and colleges have computers - Esk Valley has 70. Many of the schools have a Parent Teachers Association or something similar for raising funds.
